item.title: Webb telescope peers into our galaxy's outskirts, sees stunning scene
item.description: Astronomers pointed the James Webb Space Telescope at the Extreme Outer Galaxy, observing dynamic activity and vivid star formation.

item.title: Get Microsoft 365 for a year for only $40
item.description: A one-year subscription to Microsoft 365 is on sale for just $39.97 (reg. $69) through September 29. That includes the latest versions of Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Outlook, and OneNote.
